title: How to Thank the Bus Driver in Fortnite on Every Platform

steps.title: Press your Emote button to thank the bus driver.
steps.content: Press your Emote button to thank the bus driver. You can only thank the driver at the start of each match , right before you jump from the bus. If you miss the chance, you'll need to wait until your next match. [1] X Research source PC : Press B on your keyboard. PlayStation/Xbox/Nintendo Switch : Press down on the D-pad. Mobile : Tap the smiley face icon in the top-right corner. If this button isn't working, you may have remapped your keys. Check your settings to find your Emote key or button, and then press it to send your thanks.

steps.title: Thank the bus driver to earn progress on quests.
steps.content: Thank the bus driver to earn progress on quests. While this feature exists mostly as courtesy, you can actually complete quests this way. The "Thank the bus driver" quest can show up every so often as a weekly quest. You can earn EXP for simply pressing a button every time you enter a match. If the quest isn't active, thanking the bus driver is a way to show common courtesy and respect.
